Author: brucie239
Text: I nicked my cutlery from nandos cos i really liked the way it felt

Author: nodamncatnodamncradl
Text: I LOVE tiny silverware. I love tiny forks especially!  &#x200B;  I find silverware at thift stores, that way I can buy piece by piece. This answer might not be helpful for you.  &#x200B;  Sometimes I find airplane silverware. I have some really tiny knives because of that.
